about_the_game: Add more customisation options to the Vintek set adding more class to the vintage cars of GRIP racing and showing that newer is not always better. The pack includes two new glowing car skins (for use across all Vintek vehicles), an additional tyre rim set and 3 additional decals to use on the Vintek vehicles.
detailed_description:
WISHLIST MEOW! 😻


About the Game

Add more customisation options to the Vintek set adding more class to the vintage cars of GRIP racing and showing that newer is not always better. The pack includes two new glowing car skins (for use across all Vintek vehicles), an additional tyre rim set and 3 additional decals to use on the Vintek vehicles.
legal_notice: GRIP © 2019 Caged Element Inc. Published by Wired Productions Ltd and developed by Caged Element. GRIP and the GRIP logo are trademarks of Caged Element.  All rights reserved.
name: GRIP: Combat Racing - Vintek Garage Kit 2

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy GRIP: Combat Racing - Vintek Garage Kit 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3220 or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 560 or Radeon 6850
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Microsoft Xbox Controller for Windows® (or equivalent) is recommended.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64bit or Newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3570K or AMD FX-8320
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 970 or Radeon 380
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Microsoft Xbox Controller for Windows® (or equivalent) is recommended.

short_description: Add more customisation options to the Vintek set adding more class to the vintage cars of GRIP racing and showing that newer is not always better. The pack includes two new glowing car skins (for use across all Vintek vehicles), an additional tyre rim set and 3 additional decals to use on the Vintek vehicles.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese
